title: Bloomberg writer blasting "Sound of Freedom" has past... questionable tweets about children
description:
Corporate journalismers are still on the warpath, creating content attacking "The Sound of Freedom." It's about child sex trafficking and is based on a true story. Because a lot of conservatives are happy such an important movie is kicking Hollywood's ass, the media has to hate it and be mortified at how much money it's making. The latest example is this review from Bloomberg, but there's a twist.

Journalismer Noah Berlatsy had this to say: "Many critics have linked Sound of Freedom to the pro-Trump QAnon conspiracy cult. They've also been startled by its mainstream success. But the truth is that the conspiratorial right and the Hollywood default aren't that different — which is why, perhaps, our polity has had such difficulty rejecting QAnon, Trump and fascism."

Independent reporter Andy Ngo and YouTuber Shoe found some interesting things from Berlatsky's background that may or may not give insight into WHY he doesn't like such a movie as "The Sound of Freedom." It starts with Berlatsky being the spokesperson for a M.A.P. advocacy group. M is for "Minor." A is for "Attracted." and P is for... you get the jist.

— (@)
"Pedophiles are essentially a stigmatized group. Certain people get designated as deviants, people hate them."
"Parents are tyrants, 'Parent is an oppressive class. There are things you can do to try and minimize the abuse that endemic to the parent/child relationship, but it's always there."
— (@)

Noah hasn't responded to Andy or Shoe's reports. And I kinda don't think he has any plans to.

With a budget of $14.5 million, this film managed to tell a more poignant story than films with ten times its budget. It earned $10 million in presales alone and has an 85% critic and 99% rating on Rotten Tomatoes and an 8.6/10 on IMDb as of now.

“Sound of Freedom” has a genuine core of righteousness that most call-to-action films do not. This is a dramatic film, but it takes pains to show that real children need help now. And it does all this while giving us more of a heartfelt story than Hollywood has in years.

Yet the media is lining up to hate it. For whatever reason.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Sports Illustrated goes nuts over Brittney Griner's dunk, gets roasted online by people who know how basketball is played
description:
The media is still trying to make the WNBA happen. Female sports fans don't care enough to make the WNBA happen. But the media still flops covering the WNBA like they're LeBron James. The barest minimal skills get YASSS KWEEN'D and SLAYYYYY GIRL'D to within an inch of its life to make the league seem watchable or enjoyable. But there's trying too hard, and then there is this Sports Illustrated tweet losing it because Brittney Griner dunked a basketball.

Before we get to the clip, not all of you may know the finer points of the game. You know when the player bounces the ball? That's called dribbling. They can't move around the court with the ball unless they are dribbling the ball. If they walk without dribbling, it is called traveling. It's a foul and the referee blows the whistle. Ok? Ok.

Now check out ya girl...

— (@)

Dude. Really?

pic.twitter.com/CmXllz6bJa
— Bonchie (@bonchieredstate) July 17, 2023

Brittney Griner knows some things about traveling. She's the basketball player who got arrested in Russia for weed, and who the Biden Adminstration traded a guy called the "Merchant of Death" for because, unlike the Marine who is also imprisoned in Russia, Griner checks off one or more boxes on the Left's preferred marginalized checklist.

The jokes wrote themselves.

— (@)
— (@)

I hope this isn't true. The DOT Secretary is an incompetent yutz and Griner is liable to get derailed in East Palestine.

— (@)

This tweet leaves out "boos the National Anthem" and "picks a fight with Alex Stein," but the point is still made. That was FLAGRANT traveling.

— (@)

The sad thing is you would assume someone who works for Sports Illustrated would know how the game of basketball is played. Perhaps wait until someone does something that is considered above average when you are playing at the professional level. You would assume that. But then you would remind yourself of the types of people who go into sports reporting today.

This was from the WNBA All-Star team where "Team Stewart" beat "Team Wilson." We here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website are unclear what those words mean, or which team Griner was on.

>

<

title: Watch: There is an animated gender-neutral Swedish coconut and they/them is coming for your children
description:
There was a pleasant time in social media when Mythinformed was banned from Twitter. No idea why, they probably quoted a CDC statistic or tweeted bout Admiral Rachel Levine. Then Elon Musk had to give everyone their accounts back, and because of that we now know that Coconut Hen -- the gender-neutral Swedish coconut -- is a thing.

I can't emphasize enough how much I'm begging anyone to tell me this is a hoax or that I'm missing the satire.

— (@)

I was about to take screen captures of the two tinier nuts and the butterfly to drive home the depravity, but the taste of bile in my mouth was overwhelming. This tweet captures the sentiment.

— (@)

The crack research team here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website did five minutes' worth of Googling, and they came back with good news and bad news. The good news is that there is no evidence of this being shown to children in a school setting (yet). The bad news is Coco has been around since 2016, has over 260,000 followers and three million likes on TikTok, and the videos are tagged "kids songs."

I know Sweeden is from a weird part of the world. In nearby Denmark, there is a children's cartoon of a man who saves the day with his giant penis. Maybe this is acceptable there. It is disturbing enough to know it would be acceptable to teachers' union employees in this country.

And I guess if I had to choose one thing to find the most offensive, it's that the songs act like an anthem for your kid's kindergarten teacher to indoctrinate them behind your back. Coco's father has the old-timey belief that boys have ding-dong and girls have a butterfly. It is the role of the KINDERGARTEN TEACHER to tell Coco to ignore his parents. Hence us adding "yet" to the qualifier there were no stories of this being shown in an educational setting.

I would be the happiest right-wing sonuvabitch blogger in the world for anyone to tell me I fell for a crude joke or that I'm hallucinating right now. Either/or.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Watch: Bystander helps put an end to a police chase... then just gets back in his truck and bounces
description:
Oklahoma Police were quick to remind citizens to put their own safety first before engaging with any nefarious characters. Not that they didn't appreciate the assistance of a random bystander seeing a cop in pursuit of a suspect and lending a hand.

Or to be more precise with my language, lending a full-body tackle. "Why you do me like that, homie?"

The suspect was at first being arrested for possession of drug paraphernalia. Then for resisting arrest, which we see in the video. Then there were a number of outstanding felony warrants for Burglary, Conspiracy, Larceny, and Illegal Firearm Possession. Hence the dude running after giving police a fake name.

What Druggy McResist did not anticipate was some random dude driving by, stopping his truck, and introducing Druggy's face to the pavement.

Our hero didn't even stick around. He went to get back in his truck and bounce. This could only have been cooler if upon tackling Druggy he got up, lit up a cig, and had a cool one-liner.

"I just did you like that, homie."

"There's no outrunning DEEZ..."

"There were two hits. Him hitting the pavement, and Toby Keith's 'Beer for My Horses' blasting out of my truck."

He at the very least needs Dre's "The Next Episode" playing in the background as he walks away.

Tulsa police added that they love our citizens and greatly appreciate all the support that we get from you. They also want to make sure you know Druggy was only arrested and has not been convicted of anything yet.

No one really knows what happened to the Man in Orange...

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Tucker Carlson calls out Chris Christie for being too big of p**** to debate him on Ukraine (but in nicer words)
description:
Tucker Carlson has a busy few days of setting (soon to be former) GOP political candidates on fire. No one is sure of Mike Pence's whereabouts after Tucker's disembowelment of him live on stage. It was the topic of discussion on Sunday shows where Chris Christie attacked Tucker's views on the Ukraine War. Yet when Carlson offered to have a longer conversation with him... Christie whiffed.

Christie, when asked how he would have responded to Tucker Carlson's Ukraine questions if he had the opportunity to, claimed "I would say 'You've always been wrong about this, Tucker. And you're still wrong.'"

— (@)

Tucker offered Christie the opportunity to have a longer conversation. Christie, allegedly according to Tucker, whiffed.

— (@)

I don't hate Christie. His time would have been eleven years ago when GOP primary voters were looking for anyone other than the candidates who announced they were running, but he still has a role to play. But for a guy whose main campaign issue is how big of a pussy Donald Trump would be if/when he refuses to debate in front of the American people, I can smell Christie's vagina from here. Though that hint of yeast in the air could be donuts.

Christie called Tucker Carlson out on television, saying what he would say to Tucker's face. Tucker responded, "Come say it to my face." Christie refuses. When given the option of nutting up or shutting up, Christie chose this to be a rare time when he shuts up. Maybe his protective of his 2.5% nationally. Maybe he called Mike Pence for advice, but Pence was too busy sitting in the shower in the fetal position mumbling "that's not my concern" to take the call.

Either way, Christie's "ego" did not permit him to answer Tucker's challenge. It's a shame because I think it would be a valuable discussion. I have no doubt that Christe and Tucker would be cordials with each other. But Congress, the media, and Big Tech keep saying we CAN'T ask questions about Ukraine let alone debate it. America could use thirty minutes of Tucker and Christie arguing their views on this topic,

>

<

title: Disney so embarrassed by these leaked live-action Snow White photos, they tried lying the photos were fake
description:
Rough week for Disney. Their CEO conceded culture war defeat to GOP presidential candidate Ron DeSantis. And their latest feature in the "get woke, go broke" genre leaked before the company was ready. Photos of Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs... I mean Seven Mystical Creatures leaked. Disney tried claiming they were fake. SPOILER: They were not.

There was drama in the "dwarf community" over the live-action movie (more on that in a bit). The DailyMail had an exclusive of what the compromise looks like:

— (@)


— (@)

Conservatives did what we tend to do... we seized. Disney, it would appear, has not lost enough money. Not even after the live-action Little Mermaid debacle. We had so much fun laughing at the seven mystical creatures' expense, it angered the Daily Beast. They reached out to Disney for response:

The photos are fake and not from our production. We are currently trying to have the Daily Mail issue a correction.

Then Disney corrected their correction.

Editor's Note: This story has been updated to reflect that… the studio later said the photos were from the production but were not official photos.

But here's the best part. The reason for these woke alterations was because, when the movie was first announced, dwarf actor Peter Dinklage lashed out calling it "tone-deaf" when it came to its depiction of the 7 dwarfs. Another member of the dwarf community Dylan Postl (aka Swoggle from The Major Wrestling Figure Podcast) said the movie could have provided seven members from the community acting roles they wouldn't normally get.

Take a closer look at the one short guy in the photo.

It's Peter Dinklage.

Disney's Snow White is, at least for now, scheduled to be released on March 22, 2024. I say "for now" because methinks this one may be getting shelved.

>

<

title: Justin Trudeau thinks Canadian Muslims are stupid, blames American right-wingers for their anger at gender issues
description:
The utter shamelessness of white leftists turning on Muslims for disagreeing with them on gender ideology is one to be marveled at and studied. And when it comes to utter shamelessness, few white leftists are utterly more shameless than Justin "I Feel Pretty" Trudeau.

Ever since the pandemic took away parents' distractions they started to ask "Wait...you're learning WHAT in elementary school?" Parents opposing progressives pushing their radical gender ideology under the guise of "equity" were dismissed as Christian right-wingers pushing their religious beliefs on people. Muslim parents started to say, "Hey, we too disagree with this and feel an option to opt out our kids would be a fair compromise."

— (@)

As Canada's walking pile of soy and hair goop says, Nope. You silly Canadian Muslims don't ACKSHUALLY care about your children. It's because of all that Fox News you watch and Louder with Crowder Dot Com website you read.

— (@)

"People on social media, particularly fuelled by the American right-wing, are spreading a lot of untruths about what’s actually in the provincial curriculums. ... That is something that is being weaponized by people who are not doing it because of their interest in supporting the Muslim community."

Two things. One, on behalf of the American right-wing, we don't think about Canada enough to even know you have provincial curriculums let alone "spread misinformation" about them.

Two, I find it hilarious that leftists have spent so much time playing Muslims off of Christians, the Left's first instinct is to shame Muslims for daring to have an opinion the Left disagrees with.

We saw this in America. Muslims were accused of aligning with "white supremacists" for daring to speak out against what the Left wants to indoctrinate their children with.

A white, liberal, California teacher straight up lashed out at Muslim parents. "How dare you as marginalized people come here, and you don't want to talk about the oppressed trans youth … your kids are even learning what they need to learn."

Now here is I.F.P. Trudeau wanting the Muslim community -- remember, only HE is interested in supporting them -- to accept their place on the Left's Pound-for-Pound most marginalized rankings now that they have fallen behind each letter in LGBTQ2+.

Trudeau believes Muslim parents are unable to think for themselves. It's all that right-wing media leaking into the country via Twitter.

>

<
